issue.title: Custom loss function
issue.body:
Hi,

Is it possible to have the example.py show how to build a custom loss function? I'm still unable to figure out how to do it from the codes.

Thanks!

nodes.body:
Hey @ythrandir, sure, I can add something to the `example.py`.

Also, this made me realize that the docs are not updating. The new docs were supposed to have examples of `loss`, but this is not compiling for some reason. Here is the fixed version! https://pysr.readthedocs.io/en/latest/docs/options/#loss. 

I will add a couple other examples to that section to make it easier to set up.

Cheers,
Miles
Alright, here's the new loss page! Let me know if you have any other questions. Cheers, Miles
